value:
Ah, so Lute is also an envoy in the
winter festival? I'm sure her superior
intellect will be a blessing.

Being of service fills me with joy,
whether I am defeating monsters
or serving as winter envoy.

On the eve of the winter festival,
I plan on praying longer and deeper
than any other night of the year.

Isn't it beautiful? The snow in Askr
glimmers like pure silver. I will
treasure this memory for a lifetime.

Oh! I have gifts for Sir Cormag and
Genarog. I only hope that Genarog
likes them—wyverns are quite picky.

I am Artur, a humble monk. I have
come to share wintertime blessings
on $Nf's behalf.

A hearth may warm your body, but
only a smile can warm your heart.

Everyone has the right to pursue
what makes them happy. I believe
the gods wish it so.

Why does my sack of gifts feel lighter
than before? Oh dear, oh dear! The
seam has split completely!

I will prove your faith in me is
deserved. I swear this to the gods!

I am Artur, a monk from Renais. The
gods have guided me to lend my aid
to these wintertime festivities.

Brr, it sure is chilly outside today.
Have you been able to keep warm,
$Nu?$k$pI find that the grateful smiles
of the locals somehow soften
the biting sting of the cold.$k$pI'm constantly amazed by how
the people of Askr face one
hardship after another, and yet...$k$pThey find time to come together
in joyous celebration. That optimism
is more important than it may seem.$k$pI hope that this festival lives on
in the people's hearts, even after
we have restored peace.$k$pThat would make all of these battles
worth the fight, and I will be happy
to have played my humble part.
それっ
It's the winter festival.
ああっ…
The gifts...
Blessed night!
I've put my heart into this.
Just for you.
It's snowing.
I still have gifts to give...
Sigh
I'm here as a representative of the winter festival. I hope I'm doing a good job.
*surprised noise* A spider! ...Oh, it's just an ornament. Good.
I have all kinds of gifts in this bag—something for everyone!
The best part of the holidays is waking up to find something nice waiting for you!
*sneeze* It really is cold out, huh?
What should I get Lute? She'd love a bug or a monster, but, uh…
I got you a little something. I hope you like it!
Delivery!
Illuminate my path.
Let's get going.
